title: SENTIMENT (SNOWFLAKE.CORTEX) | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns a sentiment score for the given English-language input text.
A string containing the text for which a sentiment score should be calculated.

A floating-point number from -1 to 1 (inclusive) indicating the level of negative or positive sentiment in the text.
Values around 0 indicate neutral sentiment.

Users must use a role that has been granted the SNOWFLAKE.CORTEX_USER database role.
See Required privileges for more information on this privilege.

In this example, a table named reviews contains a column named review_content containing the text of reviews
submitted by users. The query returns a sentiment score for each review.
Refer to Snowflake AI and ML.
